The block for testing is: 0001111111011001001111010001110011110001111100010011110100001101

The bit string for testing is: 00100111111001111110001110000011

The bit strings for testing are: 110000111000001111111101111111110000000011100110 and 100101010101010110101010111111000001111011100101

The bit string for testing is: 010001111110101000001110111010100010101011000000

The bit string for testing is: 00100011100010100000111101000111
The bit string after Permutation is: 01010000 01110010 01101011 01101000

The test input for one round is: 0001110011110001111100011110011111100011111100010000110110001010
The corresponding round key is: 001000110001111111100101111111110000000000010101
The result of one round: 11100011 11110001 00001101 10001010 11110011 11110000 01001010 11011110

The plain text to be encrypted is: 0001111111011001001111010001110011110001111100010011110100001101
The key for encryption is: 0001110011110001000011010001111111011001001111010001100111001110
The cypher text is: 10001001 10010111 11100100 11101100 11011001 00101110 00101100 00111110
